Reviews.Title: Bad Product..... and bad customer service..WORSTTTTT
Reviews.Author: MASH
Reviews.Content: This is the worst buy I have ever done on Amazon. This is piece of junk, and waste of money. I will never do business with this seller ever again.  BAD CUSTOMER SERVICELG KE850 Prada GSM 900 - 1800 - 1900 Cellular Phone ( UNLOCKED )

Reviews.Title: Prada phone outdated
Reviews.Author: Me
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone when it first cam out. At the time in 2005-2006 when i got this phone it was very cool. But after using and Iphone and a HTC phone this is laughable at best. Out dated, slow, and on the low end of mediocre. U can get better touch screen phones for around this price that don't say Prada, and trust me you will be happier with them and not this.

Reviews.Title: Buy ANYTHING else
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This phone worked for 2 weeks then died. I tried EVERYTHING, a new battery (twice) and multiple repair service centers. Nothing worked. Save yourself time and money and buy something else, ANYTHING else.

ProductInfo.Features:
General Network Coverage - Tri-band - GSM 900, 1800, 1900
3 TFT capacitive touchscreen; 256K colors, 240 x 400 pixels
Easy-to-use Flash based user interface
2 MP camera with LED flash - records images (1600 x 1200 resolution) and video up to 30 fps
Onboard FM radio
ProductInfo.Name: LG KE850 Prada GSM 900 - 1800 - 1900 Cellular Phone ( UNLOCKED )
